title: “This Will Introduce A New Form of Entertainment” Get Ready for the Next BIG DISRUPTION | Tom Bilyeu
description:
My amazing and talented wife Lisa released her new book Radical Confidence, which you can order - and get the bonuses she’s created for you - at https://www.radicalconfidence.com. When you read this book, Lisa will teach you 10 No-BS Life Lessons to become the hero of your own life and take MASSIVE bold action to achieve your potential!

As you know, it’s my mission to help teach you how to build the MINDSET and SKILLS that will help you live an extraordinary life - and over the last few months I’ve been working hard behind the scenes to help create a brand-new tool that will help you do that.
It’s called Kyzen - and I am proud to announce that I will be bringing it to the world later this year to challenge you to empower yourself and accomplish greater things in life. To learn more, join my Discord at impacttheory.com/discord!

Check out our sponsors:

Skillshare: Explore your creativity at skillshare.com/impacttheory for a 1 month FREE trial of Premium Membership.

As Web 3 and NFTs continue to dominate conversations everywhere from Capitol Hill, to music record labels, to Twitter spaces, podcasts and so much more, we are still too early to see what’s really possible in Web 3.

Tom recently attended the NFT L.A. conference , which was a powerhouse event with some heavy hitters in the NFT space, artists, influencers, and creators all excited for Web 3, NFTs and metaverse.

This was the moment of the big reveal, Tom’s first public reveal of what was formerly known as Project Avatar. He talks about the differences between growing an audience on social media and building a collaborative community around NFT culture as he takes Impact Theory studios into the future.

Part of this journey is introducing new comers, NFT-curious peeps, and enthusiasts by creating a space and platform to help people learn and tap into their nearly limitless human potential in life and in the Web 3 side.

SHOW NOTES:

0:00 | Introduction
2:13 | Defining Web3
3:47 | Wallet Aware Gaming Experience
7:03 | Impact Theory’s NFT Standard
13:33 | Unreal NFT Possibilities
17:04 | Growing an NFT Community
23:29 | Web3 Changes
29:34 | Keep Your Edutainment
31:31 | Introducing Project Kyzen

QUOTES:

“They’re called wallets, but that’s really a pretty big misnomer, and if we’re going to stick with it, it’s wallets with more than money.” [2:58]

“I think it’s these wallet aware, highly interactive, customized game-like experiences.” [6:48]

“Unreal engine is named appropriately. It is the most unreal piece of technology you’re going to encounter. It will allow you to drag and drop your way to a video game.” [14:52]

“We’re really building with a focus on making sure that our community can co-create with us.” [19:19]

“That is the nature of change. First they ignore you, then they laugh at you, then they fight you, and then finally they accept defeat.” [24:32]

“Man you can keep your edutainment.” [29:42]

Follow Tom Bilyeu:
Website: https://impacttheory.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TomBilyeu
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tombilyeu
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tombilyeu/
